/*including satndard libraries*/

#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>

/******************************/
using namespace std;

#define ll double
#define max power(10,101)


double power(double m,int n)
{
	
	double result = 1;

	if(!n)
	return 1;
	double temp=power(m,n/2);

	result=temp*temp;
	if(n&1)
	result*=m;
	return result;
}

int main()
{
	vector<ll> fib;
	ll temp1=0;
	ll temp2=1;
	ll test;
	ll m = max;
	//vector<ll> output;
	for(ll i=1;1;i++)
	{
		ll temp = temp1+temp2;
		fib.push_back(temp);
		temp1=temp2;
		temp2=temp;
		if(temp>m)
		break;
	}

	int size = fib.size();
//	cout<<size;
	ll a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	while(a!=0 || b!=0)
	{
		
		int first,last;
		for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
		{
			if(fib[i]>=a)
			{
				first = i;
			//	cout<<first<<" " <<fib[i]<<" "; 
				break;
			}
		}	

		for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
		{
			if(fib[i]>b)
			{
				last = i;
				break;
			}
		}
	//	output.push_back(last-first);
		cout<<last-first<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b;
	}
	/*size = output.size();
	for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
	{
		cout<<output[i]<<endl;
	}*/
return 0;
}
